languages.text: Благородные проповедники Кредо проявили героизм, защищая слуг фон Валанциус от истребления разъяренными мстителями. Тысячи невинных были вывезены на кораблях пилигримов к новым мирам, чтобы найти укрытие в молодых колониях.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.
languages.original_text: Благородные проповедники Кредо проявили героизм, защищая слуг фон Валанциус от истребления разъяренными мстителями. Тысячи невинных были вывезены на кораблях пилигримов к новым мирам, чтобы найти укрытие в молодых колониях.

traits.locale_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of courage, protecting the servants of von Valancius from destruction at the hands of vengeful souls. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on the pilgrims' ships to the new worlds to find shelter in young colonies.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of courage, protecting the servants of von Valancius from destruction at the hands of vengeful souls. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on the pilgrims' ships to the new worlds to find shelter in young colonies.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius's servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrims' ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius's servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrims' ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

languages.text: 这些高尚的帝国信条布道士展现出了英雄气概，积极保护冯·瓦兰修斯的仆人免受复仇者的伤害。成千上万无辜之人乘坐朝圣者的舰船，疏散到新的世界，在年轻的殖民地寻求庇护。
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: 这些高尚的帝国信条布道士展现出了英雄气概，积极保护冯·瓦兰修斯的仆人免受复仇者的伤害。成千上万无辜之人乘坐朝圣者的舰船，疏散到新的世界，在年轻的殖民地寻求庇护。

languages.text: Noble Prediger des Glaubens vollführten Heldentaten, um die Valancius-Diener vor der Zerstörung durch rachsüchtige Angreifer zu bewahren. Tausende von Unschuldigen wurden auf Pilgerschiffen evakuiert und auf neue Welten gebracht, um Zuflucht in jungen Kolonien zu finden.
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: Noble Prediger des Glaubens vollführten Heldentaten, um die Valancius-Diener vor der Zerstörung durch rachsüchtige Angreifer zu bewahren. Tausende von Unschuldigen wurden auf Pilgerschiffen evakuiert und auf neue Welten gebracht, um Zuflucht in jungen Kolonien zu finden.

languages.text: Les nobles prêcheurs du Crédo accomplirent de nombreux actes héroïques afin de protéger les serviteurs de la dynastie von Valancius contre les attaquants avides de vengeance. Des milliers d'innocents furent évacués à bord de vaisseaux de pèlerins et conduits sur de nouveaux mondes pouvant les accueillir dans leurs jeunes colonies.
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: Les nobles prêcheurs du Crédo accomplirent de nombreux actes héroïques afin de protéger les serviteurs de la dynastie von Valancius contre les attaquants avides de vengeance. Des milliers d'innocents furent évacués à bord de vaisseaux de pèlerins et conduits sur de nouveaux mondes pouvant les accueillir dans leurs jeunes colonies.

languages.text: Los nobles predicadores del Credo realizaron actos heroicos para proteger a los sirvientes de von Valancius de la destrucción a manos de sus atacantes vengativos. Se evacuó a miles de inocentes en naves de peregrinaje hacia nuevos mundos para encontrar refugio en las colonias jóvenes.
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: Los nobles predicadores del Credo realizaron actos heroicos para proteger a los sirvientes de von Valancius de la destrucción a manos de sus atacantes vengativos. Se evacuó a miles de inocentes en naves de peregrinaje hacia nuevos mundos para encontrar refugio en las colonias jóvenes.

languages.text: 信条の高貴なプリーチャーたちは、復讐心に燃えた攻撃者たちの手による破壊からフォン・ヴァランシウスのしもべたちを守るため、英雄的行為を行った。何千人もの罪のない人々が巡礼船に乗って新しい惑星に避難し、若いコロニーに安住の地を求めた。
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: 信条の高貴なプリーチャーたちは、復讐心に燃えた攻撃者たちの手による破壊からフォン・ヴァランシウスのしもべたちを守るため、英雄的行為を行った。何千人もの罪のない人々が巡礼船に乗って新しい惑星に避難し、若いコロニーに安住の地を求めた。

languages.text: İtikat'ın soylu vaizleri, kahramanca eylemleriyle von Valancius hizmetkârlarını, intikam peşindeki saldırganların elinde ölmekten kurtardı. Binlerce masum, haç gemilerinde yeni dünyalara tahliye edilerek genç kolonilere sığındı.
languages.original_text: Noble preachers of the Creed performed acts of heroism to protect von Valancius servants from destruction at the hands of the vengeful attackers. Thousands of innocents were evacuated on pilgrim ships to new worlds to seek shelter in young colonies.

traits.locale_text: İtikat'ın soylu vaizleri, kahramanca eylemleriyle von Valancius hizmetkârlarını, intikam peşindeki saldırganların elinde yok olmaktan kurtardı. Binlerce masumun haç gemilerinde yeni dünyalara tahliye edilerek genç kolonilere sığınmaları sağlandı.
